text:
in the tab revision is the latest entry at the top. but in the tab workflow is
the latest entry at the bottom. i think it would be good make it more consistent
and show the latest entry allways on the top.

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 15398
changes the sort order in the workflow-info

latest entry at the top. same as revisions-info.
